title: Privacy Policy - Abstract Future Structures
metaDescription: Privacy policy for Abstract Future Structures explaining how we handle your personal data submitted through our contact form.
heading: Privacy Policy
intro: At Abstract Future Structures, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard the information you provide to us.
section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.text1: When you use our Contact page, we may collect the following details:
section1.text2: We do not collect any other personal data through this website.
section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.text1: The information you provide is used solely for:
section2.list: Communicating with you about our services.
Providing quotes or additional information you request.
section2.text2: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data with third parties.
section3.title: 3. Data Storage & Security
section3.text: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
section4.title: 4. Sharing of Information
section4.text: We will only share your personal information:
section4.list: To protect our rights or property.
section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.list: Request access to the personal information we hold about you.
Ask for corrections if your information is inaccurate.
section5.text2: To exercise these rights, please contact us at any of the phone numbers or email address mentioned in the bottom of the page.
section6.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section6.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated “Effective Date.”
